s.text: Even though I guess he's a notch or two to my left, I'd vote for him happily against Hillary or Rudy for practically any office--because he has a sense of humor and seems like a vital, mentally healthy person of strong character.
So don't make me out to be some kind of right-winger just because I voted for Giuliani and never much liked Bill Clinton and don't live on the Upper West Side.
Of course I know you know that designs on plates with chocolate syrup are very late '80s.

A friend of mine who's a theater director recently told me that I should tell another friend of mine who's a speechwriter for Bradley that he, the director, would like to help coach the candidate in big-audience performing skills.
